name: scatter-brain
description: Reign in the chaos of daily tasks and keep score along the way

scripts.dev:app: cd app && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.dev:studio: cd studio && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.dev: npx ttab 'npm run dev:app' && npx ttab 'npm run dev:studio'
scripts.prod:app: cd app && npm install && npm run build --base=/scatter-brain/ && cp -r ./dist ../docs
